MS MCQs

    Create multi-page Xamarin.Forms apps with stack and tab navigation - Implement stack navigation with NavigationPage

    »

    1. When is stack navigation a good choice for an app?

      You have only a few pages in your app and the pages all have equal importance.

      The app’s pages tend to be traversed from general to more specific.

      The app’s pages require extensive scrolling.


    2. Which property of the Xamarin.Forms Page class provides access to stack navigation functionality?

      Navigation

      Stack

      Page offers PushAsync and PopAsync methods directly.
